item.title: The First Post
item.description:
An Introduction

A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

This is a blog that I hope to get into the habit of using to share my projects. I think that this will be a good way to show other people what I’ve been up to and also to practice articulating what I’m doing and why. Most of what I plan to do here will just be sharing fun plots and code snippets, but I think that with time I may do a series of posts about statistical concept and linear algebra, with helpful visualizations.

I’ll leave this post short. Later on this week I’ll add my first real post about a fun project I did in response to Gonzalo Ciruelos’ What is the roundest country? post that went around a few years ago. Maybe after that I’ll actually lay some groundwork for what I intend to do going forward. Stay tuned!

Thanks,
Blake
